document.full_text: a prediction that a huge earthquake would destroy rome wednesday prompted fear in some people and giggles of ridicule in others but officials assured the populace that the eternal city would not be rubble by midnight.
document.title: earthquake fever hits rome as some fear "the big one"
lines_and_colors: a prediction that a huge earthquake would destroy rome wednesday prompted fear in some people and giggles of ridicule in others but officials assured the populace that the eternal city would not be rubble by midnight.
